title: Crotch strap - adjustable
description:
Product description

Crotch Strap with quick length adjustment.

The length of the crotch strap is crucial for maintaining proper trim by beginner divers. It is not less important for advanced wreck and cave divers, who use scooters or swim head down through narrow restrictions.

The quick adjust crotch strap is particularly important during courses in diving schools and in diving centres offering equipment for hire. It enables you to adjust the harness perfectly by changing the length in a few seconds.

It works perfectly with all Tecline Backplates and Harnesses. It can be also used with harnesses from other manufacturers.

PARAMETERS:
Length: 120 cm
Width: 5 cm
Material: soft, high strength polyurethane that does not damage the suit
Equipment: front scooter d-ring
